article_text:
The Demopolis Police Department has made another drug arrest in Operation "Santa's Sleigh Ride."

21-year-old Korey Ramono James was arrested Wednesday and charged with 2 counts of distribution of a controlled substance and for possession of marijuana. He was processed and then transported to the Marengo County Detention Center.

A dozen arrests have already been made in this operation that has been investigated for several months.
